long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can add notes to your watchlist in Letterboxd.

Steps to use the plugin:
- Create a list that should be used in background for storing your watchlist notes.
- Open a film page, write a note and click save.

If you save a note, it will be synced with the list you selected. When you open a film page, that note is automatically retrieved again and displayed on the page.
